mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Buddha Dhaam is dedicated to serving the monastic community and preserving sacred Buddhist sites through sustainable initiatives and direct support.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We envision a world where Buddhist teachings and practices continue to thrive, supported by a global community committed to compassion, wisdom, and service.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Buddha Dhaam is led by a dedicated team of practitioners and professionals committed to our mission.

foodAndMedical.title: Food & Medical Aid
foodAndMedical.description: Providing daily meals, medicines, and healthcare support to Buddhist monks at sacred pilgrimage sites.

waterAndRefreshments.title: Water & Refreshments
waterAndRefreshments.description: Distributing water bottles and fresh juice to monks and pilgrims at Mahabodhi Temple and other sacred sites.

stupaRestoration.title: Ancient Stupa Restoration
stupaRestoration.description: Preserving and revitalizing historic stupas and monasteries to maintain Buddhist heritage for future generations.

tripitakaChanting.title: Regular Tripitaka Chanting
tripitakaChanting.description: Organizing monks in large-scale recitations of sacred Buddhist texts to preserve spiritual traditions.

siteBeautification.title: Sacred Tree & Site Beautification
siteBeautification.description: Planting and caring for Bodhi trees while enhancing the beauty of monasteries and Buddhist pilgrimage sites.

monasticWelfare.title: Pilgrim & Monastic Welfare
monasticWelfare.description: Supporting both resident and traveling monks with accommodation, robes, and other essential needs.
